title: Did Jared Kouchner's task force do policy tests?
subtitle: It was reported that the response team led by Kouchner, Senior Adviser to President Donald Trump of the United States, did not wish to assist the Blue States.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The COVID-19 response team organized by Jared Kouchner cancelled a federally led national testing plan because, according to a member of the Task Force, the virus had hit democratic states hardest, and assisting blue states would be a political flaw, according to the July 2020 report.
